description:
A reliable trigger set at an excellent price. 1:1 actuation ensures every unit of cable you pull moves the derailleur the same amount, so the shifting is precise, easy to set and adjust, and tolerates rough rides and hard use.

  • Black painted finish
  • For 9 or 8-speed systems
  • Compatible with SRAM 1:1 rear derailleurs and SRAM, and Shimano® front derailleurs
name: SRAM X5 Trigger Shifter Set 3X9
